thread.title: Police say Tom Brady's MIA Super Bowl jersey is worth THIS much
thread.title_full: Police say Tom Brady's MIA Super Bowl jersey is worth THIS much

author: AMARA GRAUTSKI
title: Police say Tom Brady's MIA Super Bowl jersey is worth THIS much
text:
Patriots QB Tom Brady’s missing Super Bowl jersey worth $500,000 — according to Houston police Police say Tom Brady's MIA Super Bowl jersey is worth THIS much This jersey Tom Brady wore during Super Bowl LI is still missing. (Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  20 AM 
Tom Brady’s Super Bowl jersey is still missing... and Houston cops believe it’s worth half a million dollars. 
The Patriots quarterback’s jersey is valued at $500,000 and presumed stolen, with the crime considered a first-degree felony, according to a police report obtained by TMZ Sports . 
Brady, listed as the victim in the report, noticed his jersey was missing from his bag in the team’s designated locker room inside NRG Stadium not long after the Patriots’ 34-28 overtime win over the Falcons in Super Bowl LI. 
The moment was famously caught on video.
